ygData.subject: Re: lindel has a gnome!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey I was in qeynos with my gnome today and I saw a Lindell (2 L s) but I didn t ask about the pole because like someone said, it might not be a good idea to
ygData.messageBody:
Hey I was in qeynos with my gnome today and I saw a Lindell (2 L's) but I
didn't ask about the pole because like someone said, it might not be a good
idea to scare him off. He was only on for a bit (at least i only saw him for
a bit) he was talking to a friend whos name I forget and said he was gonna
go play his gnome. So he does have a gnome char and his name spelling is
Lindell. thats all I know. if its the same lindel/lindell.. Sorry i dont
know more
